title: Zooly Labs: Quick Hip Replacement Innovation Survey

elements.name: intro_text
elements.html:
Thank you for your time. Zooly Labs has developed AI-guided technology that addresses the #1 cause of hip replacement failures: component positioning.

Complete this 2-minute survey to receive your personalized practice impact report.

elements.name: hip_replacements_monthly
elements.title: How many hip replacements do you perform monthly?

elements.name: top_challenges
elements.title: What are your biggest challenges with component positioning?

elements.name: technologies_used
elements.title: Have you used any of these technologies?

elements.name: financial_viability
elements.title: At $750 per case with $1,200 reimbursement via CPT 20985, would a 5-minute setup AI positioning system be financially viable?

elements.name: next_steps
elements.title: Would you like to: (Select all that apply)
choices: Receive my personalized practice impact report
Join 100+ surgeons in our clinical evaluation

completedHtml:
Thank You!

Your personalized practice impact report is being prepared.

You'll receive:

  • Potential time savings analysis
  • Financial impact projection
  • Risk reduction metrics

A Zooly specialist will contact you within 24 hours with your results.
